operatingHours.title: Operating Hours
operatingHours.exceptionsHint: Exceptions can be configured in a future update.

help.userGuideText: Here you will find information on how to use the People Counter application.
help.faqText: Check the answers to the most common questions.
help.openTicketText: Need help? Create a support ticket and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
help.ticketListPlaceholder: Your support tickets will be displayed here.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1Title: How do I reset my password?
faq.q1Content: You can reset your password from the login page by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link.
faq.q2Content: We use industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data at all times.
faq.q3Title: How do I add a new user?
faq.q3Content: As an administrator, you can add new users from the 'User Management' section in the settings.

ticketForm.subject: Subject
ticketForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide detailed information about your issue
ticketForm.success: Ticket submitted successfully! Your ticket ID is: {{ticketId}}
ticketForm.error: Failed to submit ticket. Please try again.

footer.rights: © {{year}} LYNQ, People Counter. All rights reserved.

errors.noDataAvailable: No data available for the selected period
errors.heatmapIncompatibleGrouping: Heat Map not compatible with {{groupBy}} grouping
errors.heatmapIncompatibleInstructions: Heat maps work best with hourly or smaller time intervals. Please change the grouping to "5min", "15min", "30min", or "hour".

noData.locationComparison: No valid location data available for comparison. Please ensure sensors have recorded data for the selected period.
noData.heatmapIncompatible: This view is not available with the current time grouping.
noData.returningCustomers: No FootfallCam data available for returning customers.
noData.visitDuration: No FootfallCam data available for visit duration.
noData.affluence: No FootfallCam data available for affluence.
noData.topStoresDescription: No location data available for the selected period. Please ensure you have multiple locations with sensor data.

charts.cumulativeNote: Cumulative count resets daily at midnight

returningCustomers.title: Returning Rate
returningCustomers.description: The percentage of visitors who had previously made a visit to the same store within the past 60 days

avgVisitDuration.title: Average Visit Duration
avgVisitDuration.description: Average time customers spend in the establishment

affluence.title: Affluence
affluence.description: Percentage of entries relative to outside traffic (Entries/Outside traffic)

charts.topStoresDescription: Top performing stores based on selected metrics

metrics.totalInDescription: Total number of people who entered the monitored area during the selected period.
metrics.totalOutDescription: Total number of people who exited the monitored area during the selected period.
metrics.entryRateDescription: Percentage of total traffic that entered the monitored area (In divided by total movements).
metrics.dailyAverageInDescription: Daily average of people entering, calculated from the selected period data.
metrics.dailyAverageOutDescription: Daily average of people exiting, calculated from the selected period data.
metrics.percentageChangeDescription: Percentage change in entries from the first to the last day of the selected period. Indicates whether foot traffic increased or decreased in relative terms.
metrics.mostCrowdedDayDescription: Day with the highest number of entries within the selected period.
metrics.leastCrowdedDayDescription: Day with the lowest number of entries within the selected period.
metrics.returningCustomersDescription: The percentage of visitors who had previously made a visit to the same store within the past 60 days
metrics.avgVisitDurationDescription: Average time customers spend in the establishment
metrics.affluenceDescription: Percentage of entries relative to outside traffic (Entries/Outside traffic)
metrics.noDataAvailable: Data not available for this period

users.addUserContentComingSoon: The functionality to add users will be available soon
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

errors.startDateAfterEndDate: Start date cannot be after end date
errors.endDateAfterToday: End date cannot be in the future
errors.endDateBeforeStartDate: End date cannot be before start date

landing.title: People Counter
landing.subtitle: Track, analyze, and optimize people flow. Powerful insights from accurate sensors and smart dashboards — all in one platform.

features.title: Powerful Features for Smart Decisions
features.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of your space with our comprehensive people counting platform.
features.trafficAnalyticsDesc: Monitor people flow with comprehensive visualizations
features.advancedComparisonsDesc: Compare metrics across locations and time periods
features.keyMetricsDesc: Track entries, exits, and conversion rates

customizable.title: Customizable Dashboards
customizable.desc: Tailor your dashboard with drag-and-drop widgets and save multiple layouts

unified.title: Unified Platform
unified.desc: Manage all your locations and sensors in one place

updates.title: 5-Minute Updates
updates.desc: Get near real-time data with frequent updates

features.multiLocationDesc: Easily manage and compare multiple locations
features.automaticReportsDesc: Schedule and receive regular reports via email
features.customizationDesc: Choose from a variety of chart types and metrics to suit your needs

smartAlerts.title: Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.desc: Set up notifications for key events and thresholds

analytics.title: Comprehensive Analytics
analytics.desc: In-depth insights with a wide range of charts and visualizations

mobile.title: Mobile Friendly
mobile.desc: Access your dashboard and reports on any device, anywhere

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: Your data is protected with industry-standard security practices

analytics.title: Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard
analytics.subtitle: Monitor your space with powerful charts and customizable views. Get insights updated every 5 minutes with a wide range of visualization options.

comparison.title: Multi-Location Intelligence
comparison.subtitle: Compare performance across all your locations with side-by-side analytics and unified reporting.
comparison.feature2Desc: Tailor charts and metrics to your needs

platform.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
platform.subtitle: Built for businesses that need accurate, actionable insights from their space analytics.
platform.feature2Desc: Tailor dashboards to your specific needs
platform.feature3Desc: Unified platform for all your analytics
platform.feature4Desc: Near real-time data for timely decisions

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Space Analytics?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses using our platform to optimize their operations and enhance customer experience.

login.subtitle: Login to continue exploring your metrics.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

locations.description: This page displays the locations associated with your business.
locations.name: Name
locations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this location? This action cannot be undone.
locations.formErrorDesc: Please fill in all required fields.
locations.deleteWarning: Deleting this location will permanently remove it from the system. All sensors and devices associated with this location will also be deleted and their data will no longer be accessible.

connections.title: Connections
connections.subtitle: Manage external connections for
connections.name: Connection Name
connections.passwordEditPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current password
connections.sensitiveFieldEditPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current value
connections.getStarted: Get started by creating a new connection.
connections.passwordHint: Password is hidden for security. Enter a new password only if you want to change it.
connections.sensitiveFieldHint: This field is hidden for security. Enter a new value only if you want to change it.

connections.testFailed: Connection test failed. Please check your credentials.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Configure and generate reports for your business.

welcome.title: Welcome to Dashboard
welcome.content: This is your main dashboard where you can view and analyze your pedestrian data.

filters.title: Dashboard Filters
filters.content: Use these controls to filter your data by date range, sensors, and time periods.

metrics.title: Key Metrics
metrics.content: View important metrics and KPIs for your selected time period and locations.

charts.title: Data Visualizations
charts.content: Interactive charts showing your pedestrian analytics data with various visualization options.

editLayout.title: Edit Mode
editLayout.content: Click here to enter edit mode and customize your dashboard layout.

widgetArea.title: Widget Area
widgetArea.content: This is where your dashboard widgets are displayed. In edit mode, you can drag and drop widgets to customize the layout.

layoutSelector.title: Layout Selection
layoutSelector.content: Choose from different dashboard layouts to organize your widgets.

customizedPlan.title: Request Customized Plan
customizedPlan.subtitle: Tell us about your specific needs and we'll help you create a tailored solution for your business.

form.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your specific needs, number of locations, expected traffic volume, required special features, etc.

success.title: Request Sent Successfully!
success.description: We have received your customized plan request. Our team will contact you within the next 24-48 hours to discuss your specific needs.

error.cancelledByUser: The payment process was cancelled. You can try again anytime.
error.needHelp: Need assistance? Our support team is here to help.
